downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Nano Agent cab file for UR2
downloadDescription: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Nano Agent cab file for UR2
detailsSection:
Installing Updates to Nano Agent can be done by two methods
1. Push updates from management server
2. Download and install updates manaually through Powershell script
To install the updates manually down the cab file available on this resource and run the UpdateNanoServerScomAgentOnline.ps1 script

For more details, please check the technet on Monitoring Nano Server.
systemRequirementsSection: Nano agent is available only for System Center Operations Manager 2016
installInstructionSection: Please see the technet for instructions
